meanings.sent1: She is posing for a picture.
meanings.sent2: The model is posing in front of the camera.
meanings.sent3: The man kept posing with funny faces, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The tree was posing gracefully against the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The dancer was posing elegantly on stage.

meanings.definition: Pretending to be someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The posing clown entertained the children at the party.
meanings.sent2: Her posing behavior made it hard to trust her.
meanings.sent3: The posing superhero costume was a hit at the costume party.
meanings.sent4: The posing chameleon blended perfectly with its surroundings.
meanings.sent5: The posing pirate costume looked very realistic.
